stencil.twig:
<style>
.item {
    float: left;
}

body {
    font-family: "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;
    line-height: 1;
}

body {
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}

.emojione {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px
}

.pic-container {
    width: 270px;
    height: 270px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 32px;
}

.pic-container img {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}

#content {
    font-size: 0;
}

.container {
    width: 960px !important;
    height: 350px !important;
    display: inline-block;
}

.twitter-container {
    position: relative;
    top: 8px;
    left: 8px;
    border: 1px solid #eee;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
    width: calc(100% - 16px);
    height: calc(100% - 16px);
}

.main-tweet {
    font-size: 28px;
    padding: 42px 16px 8px 0px;
    line-height: 120%;
    color: #434343;
    overflow: hidden;
    max-height: 220px;
}

.twitter-date, .twitter-location {
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-right: 8px;
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #434343;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.twitter-date {
    color: #6e6e6e;
}

.col-left {
    width: 334px;
}

.col-right {
    width: calc(100% - 334px);
}

.twitter-col {
    float: left;
    position: relative;
    min-height: 1px;
}
</style>
